data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 277 believers in Požeško-Slavonska to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 237 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 65,700 people living in Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Croatian-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Croatian-speaking people know you.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Požeško-Slavonska to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Jesus, please give your people in Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia has a population of 65,700.

We estimate Požeško-Slavonska has 277 people who might know Jesus, 60,375 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,048 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Požeško-Slavonska, Croatia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.
